name: City Defenders (Evolus)
description:
City Defenders

A game I made for https://gamelabgraz.com/courses/gdd1/. Try to survive as long as possible. If you defeat an enemy they probably leaf something valuable behind. All the graphics are hand drawn, and all the audio is self recorded. Despite the effort I put into audio recordings, I would suggest to turn the sounds off.

Have Fun!

Controlls: ASWD

Shoot: Space
